WorkItem.Description: Suggestion from a blog commenter to add the anti-forgery tokens to our post operations. Steve's blog post from a few years ago pretty much sums up what we would be looking to avoid: http://blog.stevensanderson.com/2008/09/01/prevent-cross-site-request-forgery-csrf-using-aspnet-mvcs-antiforgerytoken-helper/
WorkItem.Summary: Add anti-forgery tokens to dinner controller.
